data.message: Glassmorphism Color Depth Hierarchy (5 layers back-to-front): 1) Dark mass anchor (#0A0A0C), 2) Primary accent slice (55% opacity), 3) Secondary accent slice (75% opacity), 4) Subtle overlay arc (low opacity), 5) Vignette (darkens edges uniformly). This layering creates the rich environment that makes glass effects look legitimate.
